alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Harlan; Kearney; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 29 at 5:37PM CDT until April 29 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Franklin County in south central Nebraska... Southeastern Phelps County in south central Nebraska... Southern Kearney County in south central Nebraska... Northeastern Harlan County in south central Nebraska... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 537 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Funk to near Ragan to near Huntley, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Wilcox around 545 PM CDT. Axtell and Hildreth around 550 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Minden, Upland, Campbell and Norman. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for south central Nebraska. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for south central Nebraska.
